column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////One possible explanation: Did you request your extra toppings to be packed separately? In most cases we try pack extra toppings directly in the to-go container that has the cooked noodles
column2: chashu (or wontons) and requisite toppings. Many times customers mistake the extra amount with the amount of toppings that comes with the item. For example
column3: if you order a Spicy Chicken Ramen with extra spicy bean sprouts
column4: your order will have twice the amount of spicy bean sprouts inside the container.
